7.9.23  7:08 am   did you ever get piano lessons or lessons in music making before making banger music?

     not much. at various times in my childhood i've had a few sessions with teachers or mentors. sometimes i'd learn some really cool stuff. other times not. the vast majority of my musical experience has been either alone or in professional or social environments

     also, do you enjoy listening to your old music or does it make you cringe, i must know

     i don't recall

      yes

7.8.23  8:18 pm   Do you think is there a true meaning of 'life'?

     i would have put the quotes around 'true meaning'

     If yes, then what are the principles/laws of it?

     fairly infinite in nature. if you remove your own personal perspective or angle, you're left with something that is defined equally well from all angles

7.8.23  5:13 am   How do I get inspiration for writing tunes?

      i'm not sure. just switch back and forth between trying to write tunes and not trying. keep switching back and forth, and, over the course of several days, the inspiration will forget whether you're trying or not and just give it to you

7.8.23  4:14 am   Why does the airport terminal have a reference to out to lunch?

      i don't recall "out to lunch" being in the song, but it might be in the video. "out to lunch" is a cool sounding phrase, in my opinion. it's probably no longer used for lunch purposes, but it's fresh enough in people's memories that it's still a well known classic. even better, my highschool science teacher used to use it to mean "totally incorrect" or "having no idea what they're talking about." for example if you say Paris is the capital of Spain, that's considered "out to lunch". i suppose i've had a fondness for that phrase ever since

7.8.23  3:14 am   hello bill whats your inspiration? if you have one

      inspiration goes every which way. almost anything can inspire me, and, with any luck, i'll inspire others

      i would prefer to make a new one to be my favorite

7.7.23  4:55 pm   what do you think about the diverse usages of the word 'stick'? its like a wood stick, but also a shape, and stickY is a new adjective of dimension, while the verb stick is kinda like pushing (noun) into something. thoughts?

      that seems like about the average number of meanings for a 1 syllable word

7.7.23  4:38 pm   do you have any tips on how to compose a good melody? during my testing compositions, I've always found my melodies to be a bit shoddy in comparison to the other instruments, and I kinda need some advice
thanks

      a good melody is all about proving you're alive. so in some ways that means reverse psychology. what is something a melody would NEVER do? try doing that, and you're off to a good start

what do you think is the best way to start a conversation?

7.6.23  5:15 pm   hi bill wurtz,
1. do you feel responsibility?

     sometimes

     2. if yes, does it cause you stress,

     sometimes a little bit

     and if so, how do you deal with that stress?

     talk about it

     /if no, how do you avoid feeling responsible?

     try to make sense of what i can and can't do

     no

     thank you very much!
